title: List of municipalities in Mississippi
summary: Mississippi is a state in the Southern United States. According to the 2010 United States Census, Mississippi is the 32nd-most populous state, with 2,968,103 inhabitants and the 31st largest by land area, spanning 46,923.27 square miles (121,530.7Â km2) of land.[1] Mississippi is divided into 82 counties and contains 299 incorporated municipalities, consisting of cities, towns, and villages.[2][3] Mississippi's municipalities cover 4.3% of the state's land mass and are home to 50.5% of its population.[1]
